definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Most of the men give no consideration to the colors of the traffic signal.
sentences.chinese: 大多數男人對交通信號燈不夠重視。

sentences.english: When the yellow light is on, it allows the vehicles to pass.
sentences.chinese: 交通信號燈黃燈亮時，准許車輛通行。

sentences.english: They used fake signal lights to bait the enemy ships onto the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他們用假信號燈誘使敵船觸礁。

sentences.english: Brakes and signals were visible without.
sentences.chinese: 車外的分軌閘和信號燈清晰可見。

sentences.english: ONPOW manufacture are major in develop the pushbutton and indicator lamp.
sentences.chinese: 浙江紅波按鈕主要開發按鈕開關及信號燈產品。

sentences.english: The red traffic light indicates that every person and vehicle must stop.
sentences.chinese: 紅色信號燈表示人和車輛不能通行。

sentences.english: Keep headlights clean and working . Do the same for taillights and signal lights.
sentences.chinese: 保持前燈，尾燈和信號燈清潔和工作。

sentences.english: The footages starts with a traffic light shaking.
sentences.chinese: 該影像開始於交通信號燈的晃動。

sentences.english: Make identification with daylight signaling lamps.
A number of nightingales with traffic lights tied to their legs flew past me.
sentences.chinese: 一羣腿上綁着信號燈的騎士從我身邊飛過。

sentences.english: Party B should hang up the signal flags or lamps during poisonous fumigation.
sentences.chinese: 乙方在燻蒸期間，應全程懸掛信號旗或信號燈。

sentences.english: The signal lamp glares shiningly in the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 信號燈在夜空裏發出耀眼的光芒。

sentences.english: Turn left at the signal light.
And in Singapore, where signals respond to traffic flow.
sentences.chinese: 還在新加坡測試過，那裏的信號燈反應交通流量。

sentences.english: The most common building blocks of intertask communication are semaphores and mutexes.
sentences.chinese: 大部分進程間通訊的建立的基石是信號燈和互斥。

sentences.english: Music video for 'Whisper Away' by American Blinker.
sentences.chinese: 音樂錄像爲“護舒寶”由美國信號燈。

definition: (of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other
